resources.string: Please enter your phone number to continue
Use the phone number linked to your BVN can enjoy best service.
By continuing, you agree to the terms and privacy.
Please read and agree the Terms & Privacy.
Please enter the OTP we sent to +%s via sms
Can\'t recieve SMS ? \nDial USSD code to get OTP
It is only for the method provide in App
Please do not transfer money to any stranger. Be careful not to be cheated.
Sorry!!! \nWe could not approve your loan at the moment because of certain reasons. Please keep better records and apply later.

Possible Reason ：
• Low credit Score
• We got your credit score from an 
 independent credit agency and you can improve it by building good credit history
The account only available for you， order will auto settled in 1 hour after repayment

To assess your profile and create tailored loan products, we need to get your permissions for accessing information on your SMS, Contacts. Your data is well protected and used for assessment only. Without your consent, we will not share your personal information and data with any third party. The platform will ensure 100% security of your information. All the information will be uploaded to our server (url https://srv.crediting.com/ ) as the input of our crediting model.
We use applist data to distinguish fraudulent customers. Your information will be stored encrypted crediting.com. Your data will be uploaded to our server (https://srv.crediting.com/).
It is used to identify the user identity, prevent malicious programs and safe operation.
It is used to identify the user identity, prevent malicious programs and safe operation. We will obtain your storage permission to ensure the normal operation of the program.
We use your location, device and usage data for anti-fraud and credit modeling purpose.

We use aspects of your phonebook and contact data to help us prevent fraud and determine your eligibility for credit. Your data will be uploaded to our server (https://srv.crediting.com/). Icredit will never use contact or phonebook data to contact your friends or family.

We use SMS data to retrieve financial and transactional data to understand your financial history and help us determine your eligibility for credit. Your information will be stored encrypted crediting.com. Your data will be uploaded to our server (https://srv.crediting.com/).
Please read the authorization carefully before using Icredit
